data.prayer: Father, help the 5,795 believers in Kanchanaburi to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 890,405 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kanchanaburi, Thailand
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Kanchanaburi, Thailand to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.section_summary: On average, 111 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Kanchanaburi, Thailand.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Kanchanaburi.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Kanchanaburi. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Deaf people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, help the people of the the state of Kanchanaburi to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Kanchanaburi you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kanchanaburi, Thailand has a population of 896,200.

We estimate Kanchanaburi has 5,795 people who might know Jesus, 5,916 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 884,489 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help 179 new simple churches start among the 896,200 people in the state of Kanchanaburi, Thailand. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.
